com.astamuse.asta4d.web.builtin

Class StaticResourceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.astamuse.asta4d.web.builtin.AbstractGenericPathHandler
      • com.astamuse.asta4d.web.builtin.StaticResourceHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SiteCategoryAwaredStaticResourceHandler

    public class StaticResourceHandler
extends AbstractGenericPathHandler
    A static resouce handler for service static resources such as js, css or static html files. The following path vars can be configured for specializing response headers:
    • VAR_CONTENT_TYPE
    • VAR_CONTENT_CACHE_SIZE_LIMIT_K
    • VAR_CACHE_TIME
    • VAR_LAST_MODIFIED
    Or the following methods can be override for more complex calculations:
    • judgContentType(String)
    • getContentCacheSizeLimit(String)
    • #decideCacheTime(String)
    • getLastModifiedTime(String)
    Author:
    e-ryu

      • judgContentType

        protected String judgContentType(String path)
        The header value of Content-Type
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • decideCacheTime

        protected long decideCacheTime(String requiredPath,
                               String actualTargetFilePath)
        The header value of Cache-control and Expires. override this method to supply the specialized cache time.
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        cache time in millisecond unit

      • getLastModifiedTime

        protected long getLastModifiedTime(String path)
        The header value of Last-Modified. override this method to supply the specialized last modified time
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        the time of last modified time in millisecond unit(In http protocol, the time unit should be second, but we will cope with this matter)

      • getContentCacheSizeLimit

        protected int getContentCacheSizeLimit(String path)
        Retrieve the max cachable size limit for a certain path in byte unit.Be care of that the path var is set by kilobyte unit for convenience but this method will return in byte unit.
        This is a default implementation which does not see the path and will return 0 for not caching when path var is not set.

        Note: we do not cache it by default because the resources in war should have been cached by the servlet container.

        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        the max cachable size limit for a certain path in byte unit.
